purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the 44th International Conference on Conceptual Modeling (ER 2025), scheduled for October 20-23, 2025, in Poitiers, France. It invites contributions on the theme 'Building Trust Through Conceptual Modeling,' emphasizing the importance of trust in digital ecosystems. The conference seeks original research submissions on various topics related to conceptual modeling, including traditional and emerging areas. Important submission deadlines are provided, along with guidelines for paper formatting and review processes. Selected papers may be invited for a special journal issue.

infos:
